entry.title: Gao Hanyu's CV
entry.content:
Email: gaohanyu.work@gmail.com

Phone: +86-18520471360

EDUCATION

Chongqing Jiaotong University 09.2009-06.2013

  • Major: Business Administration (Bachelor of Management)
  • Honors & Awards: Outstanding performance in artistic and cultural activities 2009-2010

WORK EXPERIENCE

Joyrun Co., Ltd.

Senior Product Manager 06.2017-Present

  • Analyzed the demands of business partners, users, and operation and product teams
  • Wrote PRD documents, promoted R&D implementation, observed data, and evaluated results
  • Reconstructed the module of the Joyrun app and launched v4.0
  • Reconstructed the social relationship and content distribution mechanism of the Joyrun app and launched v4.7
  • Provided routine maintenance and improvement for v4.1-v5.0
  • Increased the number of daily active users of the Joyrun app by 5%

Guangzhou Sponia Technology Co., Ltd.

Product Manager 06.2014-02.2017

  • Established OpenPlay project from scratch to a company supplying soccer data for 100+ customers among 8 cities, and set the highest standard of statistic data for Chinese amateur football games
  • Built up the industryâ€™s first data collecting software and methodology of OpenPlay, providing comprehensive soccer data live with the lowest price
  • Participated in the design of backend/admin tools on web platforms, helped OpenPlay operation team manage the database, and increased the accuracy of distributed data from 86% to 92% (world top accuracy rate is 98% for professional football games)
  • OpenPlay topped the market share in 5 months as the earliest and most credible soccer data provider in China

ChongQing Suntel Technology Co, Ltd.

Product Manager 06.2013-06.2014

  • Worked with 1 visual designer and 2 developers on the development of 365call apps for iOS and Android
  • Raised innovative ideas and improvement plans, conducted user research, demand analysis, interactive design
  • Designed and managed all features of 365call apps, including SIP call, V-P call, dial page, contact page, in-app purchase fare, activity page for voucher and advertising
  • Improved the app user experience and revenue, increased daily active users by 142% and user rate of recharging at first day from 9% to 17%

Zhihu.com

Product Operation Assistant 12.2011-06.2013

  • Worked in the Operation Team at Zhihu, the biggest knowledge market in China with 100m+ users to ask and answer questions of various fields

Operation

  • Evaluated the daily new content of Books/Movies/Music topics, proposed best answers, and submitted Potential Power Users list
  • Motivated the users to ask, answer and connect more in the community
  • Forwarded good answers on Zhihu WeChat official account from August to October and Renren official account from October to December

Marketing

  • Implemented channel development and advertising, planed and promoted the marketing activities
  • Responsible for Zhihu iOS app promotions, with v2.0 ranked 1st (from 63rd) in social networking category and v2.0.5 earning the highest downloads of the year
  • Researched the app data derived from iTunes Connect, API and Google Analytics, and composed the weekly research reports; proposed a data tracking platform for Zhihu and designed the prototype

Branding

  • Dealt with business competitors, arranged cooperative activities, and achieved resource exchange

EXTRACURRICULAR ACTIVITIES

Broadcasting Station, Chongqing Jiaotong University English Music Program Host 09.2009-06.2012

  • Introduced popular musicians and albums on Billboard every Sunday, and had some free talks with the guests
  • Monitored and rated one other program each week

SKILLS & INTERESTS

Softwares: Proficient in Phabricator (Facebook), Slack, Basecamp, and Jira
Electronic Keyboard: Amateur Grade 10 (highest level for mateurs)
Host of various events, speech/recital contest champion
